identity.name: Star Cement KPI Platform
identity.target_audience: CXO, Plant Heads, Energy Managers, Sales Directors
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode (Primary) for Clarity, Dark Mode (Secondary) for Command Center vibe.

accent.description: Safety Orange - Use for alerts/actions (NO YELLOW)

rules: No rounded corners > 4px. Industrial look requires precision.
Use 'Grid Borders' style: Visible 1px borders between grid items to mimic control panels.
Dense information density. Avoid excessive whitespace in data tables.
Always align numbers to the right (tabular-nums).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-sm font-medium transition-all shadow-sm active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-secondary-foreground border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-sm font-medium transition-all

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border/50 shadow-sm rounded-sm

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-sm border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines if possible, or make them very subtle (strokeDasharray='3 3'). Use 'monotone' for lines. Tooltips must be dark with white text.

landing_hero.alt: Modern cement manufacturing plant aerial view
landing_hero.usage: Hero section background with dark overlay

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text-slate-500 is not used on grey backgrounds. Use text-slate-600 or darker.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html head.
TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors (Deep Teal #0E7490 as primary) and fonts.
LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Use CSS Grid.
COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn components but OVERRIDE the rounded corners to 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' for the industrial feel.
POWER BI: Create a wrapper component for Power BI Embed that handles the 'Offline Mode' toggle gracefully (showing static Recharts when offline).
AI CHAT: Design the 'Ask My Data' modal to look like a terminal or a clean chat interface (not a playful bot). Use a monospace font for the AI response.
FILE UPLOAD: Make the drag-and-drop zone large, with a dashed border and distinct 'active' state.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, grid items).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
